title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7024.6 - Religious dietary laws
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7024.6 - Religious dietary laws

State Regulations

Prisoners are entitled to observe reasonable dietary laws
established by their religion. Each facility shall provide prisoners with food
items sufficient to meet such reasonable religious dietary
laws. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7024.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
